title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Up for grabs are five of the 60mm titanium and steel SquirrelBits coins made by LiquidOptions:LOT 1: Rat Poison Squared #1 bc1qc0derzv, TitaniumSTARTING BID: 0.0030BTCLOT 2: Disobey #1 bc1q0pt0utyt, TitaniumSTARTING BID: 0.0034BTCLOT 3: 8888 Bits #1 bc1qh0ld0naq, TitaniumSTARTING BID: 0.0089BTCLOT 4: Happy Fucking 2022 #1 bc1qgrnchq, SteelSTARTING BID: 0.0023BTCLOT 5: Bitcoin Is Almighty #1 bc1qtk0ust3c, SteelSTARTING BID: 0.0034BTCSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: MARCH 2nd, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: DECLINE TO BE LISTED

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 each @ 0.01These were all limited to 21, right?Checked this: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5383636.msg60925122#msg60925122But not sure which one is the rat poison coin.

comments.author: DirtyBirdE
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on February 26, 2023, 11:54:35 PMLot 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 each @ 0.01These were all limited to 21, right?Checked this: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5383636.msg60925122#msg60925122But not sure which one is the rat poison coin.Rat one is part of the super shadowy coders 3pc set, 13 sets total. So rat poison is 1/13Lot 1 - .02
